name: meal-planner-agent
description: AI-powered meal planning web application with Claude AI - Monorepo

scripts.build:clean: rm -rf apps/web/.next packages/*/dist packages/*/src/**/*.js && pnpm -r build
scripts.build:production: NODE_ENV=production rm -rf apps/web/.next packages/*/dist packages/*/src/**/*.js && NODE_ENV=production pnpm -r build
scripts.build:docker: rm -rf apps/web/.next packages/*/dist packages/*/src/**/*.js node_modules && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm --filter @meal-planner/database generate && pnpm --filter @meal-planner/database build && pnpm --filter @meal-planner/core build && pnpm --filter @meal-planner/queue build && pnpm --filter @meal-planner/web build
